'bu'neng'yin'jue'zi'cai 不能引决自裁
'bu'neng'yi'yan'dou'qi'suo'zi'hua 不能以言读其所自化
'bu'neng'yong'lu'mi'xian'ke 不能拥路迷仙客
'bu'neng'yong'ye 不能用也
'bu'neng'yu'ren'bing 不能与人柄
'bu'neng'yu'zhi'yu'huai 不能喻之于怀
'bu'neng'zao'chao 不能造朝
'bu'neng'zheng'qi'shen 不能正其身
'bu'neng'zheng'wu'yin 不能正五音
'bu'neng'zhe'zhi 不能者止
'bu'neng'zhi'lei'yu 不能致雷雨
'bu'neng'zhuan'dui 不能专对
'bu'neng'zhu'e'yu'zhu'xiong 不能诛恶与诛凶
'bu'neng'zi'mian 不能自免
'bu'neng'zi'ying'sheng 不能自营生
'bu'nian'chu'pi'xiang 步辇出披香
'bu'nian'ci'shi'qu'ru'shi 不念兹时去如失
'bu'nian'jiu'e 不念旧恶
'bu'nian'ju'an'si'wei 不念居安思危
'bu'nian'jun'en'zuo'yao'luo 不念君恩坐摇落
'bu'nian'kong'zhai'lao'bing'sou 不念空斋老病叟
'bu'nian'qian'men'chu 步辇千门出
'bu'nian'seng'mian'nian'fo'mian 不念僧面念佛面
'bu'nian'tai'xian'long'qiao'hua 步粘苔藓龙桥滑
'bu'nian'xie'shou'hao 不念携手好
'bu'nian'xi'zhe 不念昔者
'bu'nian'zhi'shan'dian 步辇陟山巅
'bu'ni'dao'cheng'nan 不拟到城南
'bu'ni'hui'tou'wang'gu'xiang 不拟回头望故乡
'bu'ning'bu'ling 不宁不令
'bu'ni'she'lai'zhe'lao'yan 不拟折来遮老眼
'bu'ou'ge'yao'zhi'zi'er'ou'ge'shun 不讴歌尧之子而讴歌舜
'bu'ou'ge'yi'er'ou'ge'qi 不讴歌益而讴歌启
'bu'pa'fei'wen'ru'li'bao 不怕飞蚊如立豹
'bu'pa'feng'hua'shou 不怕逢花瘦
'bu'pa'huang'jin'ba'dao'shuo 不怕黄巾把刀槊
'bu'pa'huang'lin'shi'li'bei 不怕荒林十里陂
'bu'pa'jiao'ren'qi'zi'mei 不怕校人欺子美
'bu'pa'ji'wu'liang 不怕饥无粮

'bu'pao'guan 不抛官
'bu'pa'shuai'weng'hao 不怕衰翁号
'bu'pa'tian'ya'hai'jiao 不怕天涯海角
'bu'pa'zui 不怕醉
'bu'pin'fu'bu'yu 不垢床挥
'bu'po'lou'lan'zhong'bu'huan 不破楼兰终不还
'bu'qian'bu'wang 不愆不忘
'bu'qian'hu'er'pi'ma'hai 不遣胡儿匹马还
'bu'qian'ji'de 不迁其德
'bu'qian'ji'qi'jin'chuang'hu 不遣鸡栖近窗户
'bu'qian'liu'tiao'qing 不遣柳条青
'bu'qi'bu'qiu 不祈不求
'bu'qi'chu'hu'fan'zhong 不蕲畜乎樊中
'bu'qi'er'hui'chong'huan'yan 不期而会重欢宴
'bu'qi'jia'er'xing 不俟驾而行
'bu'qi'jia'hang'yi 不俟驾行矣
'bu'qi'jing'cu'yan 不期精粗焉
'bu'qi'kuai'ma'qi'chan'chu 不骑快马骑蟾蜍
'bu'qi'ku'er'ku'zhe 不蕲哭而哭者
'bu'qi'lang'miao'qi'qing'tui 补葺廊庙枝倾颓
'bu'qin'bu'zhou'ben 布衾不周体
'bu'qin'chun'he 不亲春何
'bu'qin'duo'nian'leng'shi'tie 布衾多年冷似铁
'bu'qing'chang'ying 不请长缨
'bu'qing'huo'nao'zhi 不清或挠之
'bu'qing'wen'ju'shao 不轻文举少
'bu'qin'ting'jin'yao 不寝听金钥
'bu'qiong'yan 步琼筵
'bu'qi'qi'yu'pin'jian 不戚戚于贫贱
'bu'qi'ran'hu 不其然乎
'bu'qiu'gong'er'duan 不求攻尔短
'bu'qiu'han'shi'jin'nang'zeng 不求汉使金囊赠

'bu'qiu'qi'suo'zhong 不求其所终
'bu'qiu'sheng'ru'sai 不求生入塞
'bu'qiu'sui'ling'tao 不求绥岭桃
'bu'qiu'wen'da'yu'zhu'hou 不求闻达于诸侯
'bu'qiu'wen'yi'dai'xing 不求文以待形
'bu'qiu'you'sheng 不求友生
'bu'qu'bi'you'tian'yang 不取必有天殃
'bu'qu'cong'tian'le 不取从畋乐
'bu'que'xing'hong'zhi 补阙兴洪志
'bu'qu'long'bing'huang'kou'er 捕取弄兵黄口儿

'bu'qu'qing'fu 不去庆父
'bu'qu'shang'qing'gong 不去上清宫
'bu'qu'shuang'hang'bi'yue'chen 部曲霜行璧月沉
'bu'qu'zao'hua'xiang'jing'ying 不取造化相经营

'bu'ran'yu'bu'ran 不然于不然
'bu'ran'ze'yi 不然则已
'bu'rao'xi'hu'kan'bu'zu 步绕西湖看不足
'bu'rao'zhen'cong 步绕珍丛
'bu'ren'bu'zhi 不仁不智
'bu'ren'deng'gao'lin'yuan 不忍登高临远
'bu'ren'du'bu'si 不忍独不死
'bu'ren'du'chang'sheng 不忍独长生

'bu'ren'er'zai'gao'wei 不仁而在高位

'ci'ge'shang'shei'ting 此歌尚谁听
'ci'gong'gui'lai'you'bian'fu 此公归来有边幅
'ci'gong'jin'bu'yi'chong'lin 次公今不异重临
'ci'gong'le'yi'zhen'ke'ren 此公乐易真可人
'ci'gou'wu'suo'shou 此苟无所受
'ci'guan'bu'chu'yi'shui'zhi 辞官不出意谁知

'ci'gu'nai'qing'qian 此谷乃清浅
'ci'gu'neng'yong 慈故能勇
'ci'guo'bu'cai'zhi'mu'ye 此果不材之木也

'ci'he'mu'ye'zai 此何木也哉

'ci'ru'tai'e'feng 词如太阿锋

'ci'san'zhe'bu'ke'zhi'ji 此三者不可致诘
'ci'san'zhe'yi'wei'wen 此三者以为文
'ci'san'zhe'yi'wei'wen'bu'zu 此三者以为文不足

'ci'shan'chu'fei'liu 刺山出飞流

'er'ren'xiang'shi'er'xiao'yue 二人相视而笑曰
'er'ren'xiang'yu'mu'yang'er'ju'wang'ji'xiang 二人相与牧羊而俱亡其羊
'er'ren'yi'wei'ji'bao 而人以为己宝
'er'ren'yi'you'bu'mang'zhe'hu 而人亦有不芒者乎
'er'ren'zhen'yi'wei'qin'xing'zhe'ye 而人真以为勤行者也
'er'ren'zhi'suo'han'zhi'yan 而人之所罕至焉

'er'rong'ya'ran 而容崖然
'er'ru'bu'zhi'jing 而汝不知敬

'er'ru'mo'nai'shi'li 而儒墨乃始离

'er'sang'ren'zhi'guo'ye 而丧人之国也

'er'se'jiang'ping'zhi 而色将平之

'er'shi'ceng'ji'de 儿时曾记得
'er'shi'chang'you'zui'xiang'li 二十长游醉乡里
'er'shi'dao'qian'zhi 儿失刀椠职
'er'shi'hu'wei'han'bu'chu 而石湖畏寒不出
'er'shi'jiu'nian'zhi'yi'fei 二十九年知已非
'er'shi'ji'zi'ji'ye 而使其自己也
'er'shi'kai'shi'zhi'zai 而世岂识之哉
'er'shi'ke'bing'an 二事可并案

'er'wu'you'yi'wu'you 而无有一无有
'er'wu'yu'ren'chu'bu'yi 二物与人初不异

'er'xiao 二萧
'er'xiao'wei'bi'ai 而孝未必爱
'er'xi'lai'wei'zhi 而奚来为轵
'er'xin'bu'xie'yu'zhi'ju 而心不屑与之俱
'er'xing'ming'lan'man'yi 而性命烂漫矣

'er'xing'wei'shuai'lao 尔形未衰老

'er'xu'wen'yi'ding'fei'cong 耳虚闻蚁定非聪
'er'ya'bian'pai'wu'wei'yi 二雅褊迫无委蛇
'er'ya'bu'wei'jia'sun 而崖不为加损
'er'ya'cheng'huang 而压城荒

'er'yan'hu'su'chi'zeng'shei 儿言觳觫持赠谁
'er'yan'neng'mei'wo'zai 尔焉能浼我哉
'er'yan'xiu'hu'zhi'zhi'suo'bu'zhi 而言休乎知之所不知
'er'yao'zhi'bi'wu'ke'tao'bi'zhe'ye 而要之必无可逃避者也
'er'ya'yi'wu'ci'xiang'da 而崖亦无词相答
'er'yi'bao'lu'xiang 儿已薄禄相
'er'yi'bu'bian'chu 二仪不辨处
'er'yi'bu'chuai'ye 而以哺啜也
'er'yi'bu'ke'dai 而一不可待
'er'yi'chu'chuang'xiang 二仪初创象
'er'yi'dao'yu'shi'kang 而以道与世亢
'er'yi'fa'jin'fu'zhu'ren 而以法尽付诸人
'er'yi'fan'ji'zhen 而已反其真
'er'yi'he'chang'shi'zhi'you 而亦何常师之有
'er'yi'jun'si'xu 二仪均四序
'er'yi'ku'yu'guo'he'qi 尔亦枯鱼过河泣
'er'yi'pi'fu'cong'chou 而以匹夫从仇
'er'yi'qi'guan'shao'zhi'ye 而以其官召之也
'er'yi'ru'yi'shi'fei'yi 而劓汝以是非矣
'er'yi'shen'qing'tian'xia 而以身轻天下
'er'yi'shi'xiang'yun 而以是相蕴
'er'yi'ta'ci'wu'shou 而以他辞无受
'er'yi'wu'suo'jian 而一无所鉴
'er'yi'xian'qi'suo'shi 而一闲其所施
'er'yi'yi'wei'ming 而以益为名
'er'yi'yi'yu'zhi 而以义喻之
'er'yi'zi'er'ben'gu'ye 而夷子二本故也
'er'yong'liu'su'ren'zhi'yan 而用流俗人之言

'er'yong'zhi'huo'bu'ying 而用之或不盈
'er'you'bu'sui'yi'dai 而又不随以怠
'er'you'chu'yan'ruo'shi 而犹出言若是
'er'you'hai'zhi 而又害之

'jian'zhi'ji'liu'shang 茧纸记流觞

'jie'yuan'fen'zhu'jing 接垣分竹径
'jie'yuan'jie 解冤结
'jie'yu'chou'bei'qi'yi'jie 嗟予愁惫气已竭
'jie'yu'chuan'zhao'cai'ren'suo 婕妤传诏才人索
'jie'yu'ci'tu'jin'gu'tong 皆与此图筋骨同
'jie'yu'da'gou'meng 解雨达勾萌
'jie'yu'dong'ting'shuang'hou'cheng 借与洞庭霜後橙
'jie'yu'du'chou'ji 嗟余独愁寂
'jie'yue'er'yuan'cang'wu'ji'shi'yi 皆悦而愿藏於其市矣
'jie'yue'er'yuan'chu'wu'ji'lu'yi 皆悦而愿出於其路矣
'jie'yue'er'yuan'geng'wu'ji'ye'yi 皆悦而愿耕於其野矣
'jie'yue'er'yuan'li'wu'ji'chao'yi 皆悦而愿立於其朝矣
'jie'yue'er'yuan'wei'zhi'mang'yi 皆悦而愿为之氓矣
'jie'yu'fu'shi'lei 嗟予缚世累
'jie'yu'fu'wu'wang 皆欲赴於王
'jie'yu'ge'yuan'fan 嗟予隔远藩
'jie'yu'gua'xiong'di 嗟予寡兄弟
'jie'yu'hao'gu'sheng'ku'wan 嗟予好古生苦晚
'jie'yu'hou'si'zhe 嗟余后死者
'jie'yu'lao'yi'bai'shi'fei 嗟余老矣百事废
'jie'yu'lao'yi'juan'hu'xi 嗟余老矣倦呼吸
'jie'yu'liao'dao'wu'gui'ri 嗟予潦倒无归日
'jie'yun'dao'zi'kou'suo'chuan 皆云道子口所传
'jie'yun'fei'quan'zu'sheng'mao 皆云吠犬足生
'jie'yun'huang'di'xun'si'guo 皆云皇帝巡四国
'jie'yun'qing'ke'jiu 解酝顷刻酒
'jie'yun'shi'da'mo 皆云似达摩
'jie'yun'wu'cong'feng 解愠物从风
'jie'yu'ou'qing'gai 嗟余偶倾盖
'jie'yu'pao'zun'zi'zai'chang 借与匏樽自在尝
'jie'yu'qu'ci'ji'cong'shei 嗟余去此其从谁
'jie'yu'shao'xiao'mu'zhen'yin 嗟余少小慕真隐
'jie'yu'sheng'sui'wan 嗟予生虽晚
'jie'yu'shi'er'bu'ci 接于事而不辞
'jie'yu'ting'gu'ying'guan'qu 嗟余听鼓应官去
'jie'yu'wan'jia'chun 借与万家春
'jie'yu'wen'dao'bu'zao'wu 嗟余闻道不早悟
'jie'yu'wu'de'yu'hui'xuan 嗟余无地与回旋
'jie'yu'yi'he'xing 嗟予亦何幸
'jie'yu'yi'qie'shi 嗟予以窃食
'jie'yu'yi'qing'bi 结宇倚青壁
'jie'yu'yu'fu'zi 嗟余与夫子
'jie'yu'yu'zi'jiu'li'qun 嗟余与子久离群
'jie'yu'zhou'ye 桀与纣也
'jie'yu'zong'ji'piao'chen'tu 嗟予踪迹飘尘土
'jie'zai'bi'xu'zhong 皆在碧虚中
'jie'zai'ci'le'xiang 嗟哉此乐乡
'jie'zai'ci'wei'nu 嗟哉此为奴
'jie'zai'gu'zhou'li 皆在孤舟里
'jie'zai'lu'chui'zhi'jian'er 皆在炉捶之间耳
'jie'zai'san 解再三
'jie'zai'wei'jue'chu 戒哉惟厥初
'jie'zai'wu'dang'er'san'zi 嗟哉吾党二三子
'jie'zai'yan'qian'chang'bu'jian 睫在眼前长不见
'jie'zao'su'fen'si 诘早肃分司
'jie'zhang'fu'cui'ji 借杖扶衰疾
'jie'zheng'tu 届征途
'jie'zhe'ting'zhang'yi 解遮亭障驿
'ji'e'zhe'zi'e 其恶者自恶
'jie'zhi'fei'qi'suo'bu'shan'er'mo'zhi'fei'qi'suo'yi'shan'zhe 皆知非其所不善而莫知非其所已善者
'jie'zhi'he'wei 结之何为
'jie'zhi'jie'zhi 戒之戒之
'jie'zhi'lv'zhi'shi 截趾履之适
'jie'zhi'shan'zhi'wei'shan 皆知善之为善
'jie'zhi'shen'wu'wang 戒之慎勿忘
'jie'zhi'shi'fei 桀之是非
'jie'zhi'song'chun'bi'shou 借指松椿比寿
'jie'zhi'tong'xi'jie'xiang'si 截之痛惜皆相似
'jie'zhi'ye'bei 解之也悲
'jie'zhi'zai'de 戒之在得
'jie'zhi'zai'dou 戒之在斗
'jie'zhi'zai'se 戒之在色
'jie'zhi'zai'wu'huang 戒之在无荒
'jie'zhi'zhi'tian'xia'ye 桀之治天下也
'jie'zhi'zi'ran'er'xiang'fei 桀之自然而相非
'jie'zhong'fang'zhi'chou'mou 结众芳之绸缪
'jie'zhong'jin'xiao 竭忠尽孝
'jie'zhou'qing'huang'wai 介胄清荒外
'jie'zhou'you'yu'xie'jun'qu 解舟又欲携君去
'jie'zhuang'xiang'zhi'de'liu'lian 解装相值得留连
'jie'zhuo'wu'xian'qin 解畚逑仪
'jie'zhu'shuo'qin'ru 借箸数禽入
'jie'zi'dao'ju'jian 嗟子刀锯间
'jie'zi'fei'tan'ding'nai'chang 结子非贪鼎鼐尝
'jie'zi'huang'shi 结子黄时
'jie'zi'si'shei'wei 嗟子死谁为
'jie'zi'yuan'feng'shi 介子愿奉使
'jie'zi'yu'huang'shi 结子欲黄时
'jie'zi'zhi'chang'ju 结子置长裾
'jie'zi'zhi'huo'shi 接子之或使
'jie'zou'wei'cheng'jun'du'xi 节奏未成君独喜
'jie'zu'gui'lai'cheng'er'lao 解组归来成二老
'jie'zu'gui'lai'dao'yi'guang 解组归来道益光
'jie'zu'jin'yi'fu 解组巾一幅
'jie'zuo'dong'feng'wan'yu'zhi 借作东风万玉枝
'jie'zuo'dong'po'geng 解作东坡羹
'jie'zuo'jiang'nan'duan'chang'gou 解作江南断肠句
'jie'zuo'yu'qin'ai 结坐玉琴哀
'jie'zu'yi'gong'zhi 皆足以供之
'ji'fa'er'mei'zhe'yi'fan'zhi 积伐而美者以犯之
'ji'fa'lang'xie'zheng 既乏琅邪政
'ji'fan'ceng'zui'zhang'guan'ya 几番曾醉长官衙
'ji'fan'chun'mu 几番春暮
'ji'fan'feng'yu 几番风雨
'ji'fan'feng'yue 几番风月
'ji'fan'li'he 几翻离合
'ji'fan'li'he 几番离合
'ji'fan'qiu 几番秋
'ji'fan'shang'ren'zhi'xing'hu 其反伤人之形乎
'ji'fan'ye'yuan'gong 其反也缘功
'ji'fa're'ji'gua 其发若机栝
'ji'fei'qi'ye 其废起也
'ji'fei'shu'di'hun 既非蜀帝魂
'ji'fei'zhi'zhi'hou'de'zhi'ren'yu 其非至知厚德之任与
'ji'feng'bu'ke'chu 机锋不可触
'ji'feng'jiang'shang'qi 疾风江上起
'ji'feng'juan'ming'hai 疾风卷溟海
'ji'feng'lian'ye'guo 急烽连夜过
'ji'feng'yang'de'yi 既逢杨得意
'ji'feng'zhi'jing'cao 疾风知劲草
'ji'fen'xing'dou'feng'lei'jing 霁分星斗风雷静
'ji'fen'ye'yi'bei 其分也以备
'ji'fu'bing'xue'chu'qing'liang 肌肤冰雪助清凉
'ji'fu'bing'xue'xun'shen'shui 肌肤冰雪薰沈水
'ji'fu'hao'zhi'ye'yi 其弗好之也一
'ji'fu'pan'sheng'zhuo 既负潘生拙
'ji'fu'ruo'bing'xue 肌肤若冰雪
'ji'fu'song'sheng'chuan 吉甫颂声传
'ji'fu'xiao'yuan'dao 肌肤销远道
'ji'fu'yan'che'bu'cheng'qing 骥伏盐车不称情
'ji'fu'yi'ben'deng 及傅奕本等
'ji'fu'you'yu'tian'di 寄蜉蝣与天地
'ji'fu'you'yu'tian'di 寄蜉蝣于天地
'ji'fu'zhen'ming'dou 稽阜镇名都
'ji'gai'zhi'ci'hu 技盖至此乎
'ji'gan'gao'song 鸡竿高耸
'ji'gan'xiu'zhu'san'geng'yu 几竿修竹三更雨
'ji'gao'guan'du 几篙官渡
'ji'gao'lin'shan'shi'ren'er'hou'you'qi 其高临山十仞而后有枝
'ji'gao'tai'wei 即告太尉
'ji'ge'ming'wan'zhuan 记歌名宛转
'ji'ge'min'min 其合缗缗
'ji'ge'neng'zhi'wu'wai'xian 几个能知物外闲
'ji'ge'zhi'ye 其合之也
'ji'gong'ba'er'shang'zhe 其拱把而上者
'ji'gong'dang'bi'chun'qiu'yu 计功当毕春秋余
'ji'gong'sun'ke'zhi'yi 即公孙可知矣
'ji'gong'yuan'yang'mian 几共鸳鸯眠
'ji'gou'lou'zhang'ren'zhi'wei'hu 其佝偻丈人之谓乎
'ji'gou'xiang'ru'bao 鸡狗相乳抱
'ji'guan'bu'zheng 其冠不正
'ji'guan'fan'xian 急管繁弦
'ji'guang'fu'wa'bi'cen'ci 霁光浮瓦碧参差
'ji'guan'suan'jin'tai'cong'ming 机关算尽太聪明
'ji'guan'tai'duo'wu 其观台多物
'ji'guan'yong'jin'bu'ru'jun 机关用尽不如君
'ji'guan'yun'shu'xian 急管韵朱弦
'ji'gua'ren'yi'you'she'ji'zhi'fu'xie 其寡人亦有社稷之福邪
'ji'gua'ren'zhi'shen 及寡人之身
'ji'gu'chuan'shang'ling'hang'ji 击鼓传觞令行急
'ji'gu'chui'sheng'yu 击鼓吹笙竽
'ji'gu'chui'xiao 击鼓吹箫

'ji'gu'cui'xing'zhou 急鼓催行舟
'ji'gu'feng'shi'ju'cun 其故封识具存
'ji'gu'gan'gua'ji'gu'geng 奇孤甘挂汲古绠
'ji'gu'he'ye 其故何也
'ji'gui'bu'shen 其鬼不神
'ji'gui'bu'sui 其鬼不祟
'ji'gui'zhen'ke'ai 汲归真可爱
'ji'gu'jia'yi'su 其故家遗俗
'ji'gu'kou'yuan'lin 记谷口园林
'ji'gu'mei'zi'xiao 羁孤每自笑

'ji'guo'qing'xiang'qu 记过清湘曲
'ji'guo'wu'wei'hu 其果无谓乎

'ji'gu'tian'bang'mu 羁孤忝邦牧
'ji'gu'zang'ke'jiang'ye 即古江也

'ji'hao'zhi'ye'yu'yi'ming'zhi 其好之也欲以明之

'ji'he'mi'gua 其和弥寡

'ji'he'ru 其何如

'ji'huang'er'yun 其黄而陨
'ji'huang'ji'fu 寄黄几复
'ji'huang'shu'lang 即黄鼠狼

'ji'hu'hou'yan 几乎后言
'ji'hui'ceng'duan'chang 几回曾断肠
'ji'hui'chang'duan'chu 几回肠断处

'ji'hui'duan'jun'chang 几回断君肠
'ji'hui'fei'you'yu 际会非有欲
'ji'hui'hong'yan'lai'you'qu 几回鸿雁来又去

'ji'hui'zhen'shang 几回枕上
'ji'hu'ji'suo'chu'bu'wen 疾呼急索初不闻
'ji'hu'lie'ye'shuang 饥狐猎野霜
'ji'hun'bu'ba 其魂不罢
'ji'hun'bu'pi 其魂不疲
'ji'huo'fei'ye'xie 其或非也邪

'ji'huo'ji'zhou'zhe 其或继周者

'ji'huo'shi'ye 其或是也
'ji'huo'tong'xing'qing 奇货通幸卿
'ji'hu'peng'ding'gong'ming'shi 急呼烹鼎供茗事
'ji'hu'tian'xia 圾乎天下
'ji'hu'yu'ju'she'wang'qu 疾呼余且设网取
'ji'jia'cun'luo'ji'sheng'zhen 几家村落几声砧
'ji'jia'huan'le'ji'jia'chou 几家欢乐几家愁
'ji'jia'nai'gou 几家能彀
'ji'jian'bu'neng'zi'ju'ye 其坚不能自举也
'ji'jian'fu'guan 既见复关
'ji'jiang'ben'lai'jiu'sheng'guo 姬姜本来舅甥国
'ji'jiang'bi'ye'bi'ju 其将毕也必巨
'ji'jian'geng'ge'ji'ju'gong 击剑赓歌几举觥
'ji'jiang'qin'jing 寄将秦镜
'ji'jiang'shi'nan'tong 稽江事难同
'ji'jian'guan'shi'yin'ci'yan 即见观世音慈眼
'ji'jiang'zheng'biao'pai'xing'du 急桨争标排荇度
'ji'jian'hua'fei'neng'shang'shu 几见花飞能上树
'ji'jian'jun'zi 既见君子
'ji'jian'liu'xing'yuan 激箭流星远
'ji'jian'luo'hua'fei'xu 几见落花飞絮
'ji'jian'mi'hang'chu 即渐迷行处
'ji'jian'qi'tan'xi 击剑起叹息
'ji'jian'qiu'feng'juan'an'sha 几见秋风园渡
'ji'jian'tai'shou'fa 几见太守发
'ji'jian'wo 几见我
'ji'jian'wo'ye'shi'zi 其谏我也似子
'ji'jian'yu'jing'wen'hua'qi 既荐羽旌文化启
'ji'jian'yu'shi 技兼于事
'ji'jiao'fang'zi'wu 既觉方自悟
'ji'jiao'fen'shang'zhi'chao'rong 计较粪上之朝荣
'ji'jiao'pian'zhou'lue'xin'du 己觉扁舟掠新渡
'ji'jiao'wu'you 其觉无忧
'ji'jiao'ye'xing'kai 其觉也形开
'ji'jiao'ye'yi'dao 其交也以道
'ji'jiao'yi'xiao 及觉已晓
'ji'jiao'yu'yu 其觉于于
